testcase.failure: tests/test_builder.py:303: in test_message_recreation assert len(parsed_value) == field_def.max_length, \ E AssertionError: Field 3 length mismatch: 0 != 6 E assert 0 == 6 E + where 0 = len('') E + and 6 = FieldDefinition(field_type=<FieldType.NUMERIC: 'n'>, max_length=6, description='Processing Code', field_number=None, encoding='ascii', min_length=6, padding_char='0', padding_direction='left').max_length
